about.summary: Implements the 'Python leidenalg' module to be called in R. Enables clustering using the leiden algorithm for partition a graph into communities. See the 'Python' repository for more details: <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg> Traag et al (2018) From Louvain to Leiden: guaranteeing well-connected communities. <arXiv:1810.08473>.

commands: mamba create -yn r-reticulate -c conda-forge leidenalg pandas umap-learn

about.summary: Implements the 'Python leidenalg' module to be called in R. Enables clustering using the leiden algorithm for partition a graph into communities. See the 'Python' repository for more details: <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg> Traag et al (2018) From Louvain to Leiden: guaranteeing well-connected communities. <arXiv:1810.08473>.

commands: mamba create -yn r-reticulate -c conda-forge leidenalg pandas umap-learn

name: r-leiden
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-leiden
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/leiden_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/leiden/leiden_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a9ecbbcfa2724d8fdd0133af569278e036b25b6e2cbb23d453092cc6b3fc30e2

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-igraph
    - r-reticulate
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-igraph
    - r-reticulate

test:
  commands:
    - mamba create -yn r-reticulate -c conda-forge leidenalg pandas umap-learn  # [not win]
    - $R -e "library('leiden')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('leiden')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/TomKellyGenetics/leiden
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: "Implements the 'Python leidenalg' module to be called in R. Enables clustering using the leiden algorithm for partition a graph into communities. See the 'Python' repository for more details: <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg> Traag et al (2018) From Louvain to Leiden: guaranteeing well-connected communities.
    <arXiv:1810.08473>."
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: leiden
# Type: Package
# Title: R Implementation of Leiden Clustering Algorithm
# Version: 0.3.1
# Date: 2019-07-23
# Authors@R: c(person("S. Thomas", "Kelly", email = "tom.kelly@riken.jp", role = c("aut", "cre", "trl")), person("Vincent A.", "Traag", email = "v.a.traag@cwts.leidenuniv.nl", role = c("com")))

See the 'Python' repository for more details: <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg> Traag et al (2018) From Louvain to Leiden: guaranteeing well-connected communities. <arXiv:1810.08473>.
